entry.string: wget https://confluent-for-kubernetes.s3-us-west-1.amazonaws.com/confluent-for-kubernetes-2.6.1.tar.gz --output-document=confluent-for-kubernetes.tar.gz -q if [ $? -eq 0 ]; then echo "Chart downloaded successfully." else echo "Error: Download failed. Given URL: https://confluent-for-kubernetes.s3-us-west-1.amazonaws.com/confluent-for-kubernetes-2.6.1.tar.gz" exit 1 fi mkdir -p /var/jenkins_home/helm-charts/2.6.1 tar zxf confluent-for-kubernetes.tar.gz --strip-components=1 --directory /var/jenkins_home/helm-charts/2.6.1
